forum.content: Animals can sense emotions, or at least the chemical changes in human beings during mood changes. My dog past away last year, he was 15. I've been reading this novel, "A Dog's Purpose"; yes, the one in the theater right now. A pet really can make a difference in someone's life.

urls.description: A soldier on the verge of death rescues a kitten with no hope. Then, the kitten rescues him at 4:31.
urls.title: Omeleto

forum.title: [Warning] Ninja Cutting Onions
